title: Some Nerf-Ideas
body:
Hey Guys
i think some Champs like Riven and Annie are just too strong in ways they shouldnt be, for example riven is a mobile Fighter that can engage easily and is very hard do play against, because you cant catch her.
In my Opinion Rito should add some Mechanic like giving her higher cooldown on Q if not used to fight. 
It would change the way you play her in defensive ways, but as a fighter you are still the same Faceroll instaburst champ so it shouldnt be much of a thread.
Annie in my Opinion should get a Casttime on her Ultimate like in the Twist of Fate Cinematic, so people can Predict it and, lets be honest, it would look incredible cool if she would throw tibbers and it gets big in the Air.. <3
Let me know what you think, maybe you got some other ideas for Champs too :P
